entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Enable navigation to decompiled sources not working #68883
    17.8 P4
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync fails with the new slnx files #73004
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer #68469
    17.8 P4
  • Convert to 'switch' statement changes behaviour #71295

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused cancellation tokens from api #73020
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Pass along generic args to allow for non-allocating lambda lookup paths #73019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make enum a single byte #73018
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to a callback style in the asset finding code #73017
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change all messages to pass back their checksum. Switch to callback style #73015
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where the streaming service might return a different object than what is in the asset cache #73014
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Moving to a streaming model for piping assets from the host to the server. #73013
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add 'Make anonymous function static' feature #73012
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
    Area-Compilers
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to collection exprs #73009
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
